mixed-citation.article-title: Description of four new species of the subgenus Tachycines (Gymnaeta) Adelung, 1902 (Orthoptera: Rhaphidophoridae) from caves in China and additional notes on some previously known species

tp:nomenclature.tp:taxon-name: Tachycines ( Gymnaeta ) omninocaecus ( Gorochov, Rampini & Di Russo, 2006 )

tp:treatment-sec.p: Diestrammena ( Gymnaeta ) omniocaeca Gorochov, Rampini & Di Russo, 2006: 358 .
Tachycines ( Gymnaeta ) omninocaecus – Qin, Wang, Liu & Li 2018: 452 .
CHINA • 1 ♂ , 1 ♀ ; Hunan Prov. , Longshan County , Huoyan Village , Panlong Cave ; 3 Jul. 2014 ; Ming- Yi Tian , Wei-Xin Liu , Hao-Min Yin , Sun-Bin Huang and Xin-Hui Wang leg.; HBU .
